Class Snapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • imageanalysis.Snapshot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OCR, Preprocess, test

    public class Snapshot
extends java.lang.Object
    Snapshot class

    contains general input image accessors and mutators.

    image processing functions are done here

      • ViewImage

        public static void ViewImage(java.lang.String name)

        Loads image available in the class. If none is available, return error.

        If specific coords are given, a cropped image will be produced

        Parameters:
        xstart - starting coordinate for x-axis
        xend - (optional) ending coordinate for x-axis. will be end of image if not provided
        ystart - starting coordinate for y-axis
        yend - (optional) ending coordinate for y-axis. Will be end of image if not provided

      • SaveImage

        public static boolean SaveImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String savepath)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException

        Save image as the given filename at the given savepath.

        Parameters:
        filename - the file name
        savepath - the file path. It is relative to the source code's path
        Returns:
        a boolean value to check if ImageIO's write function succeed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error in sving image with the given image, extension.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Scales image to a given input size
        Parameters:
        src - image to be resized
        w - desired size of image width
        h - desired size of image height
        Returns:
        resized image in BufferedImage type

        Parameters:
